Flow.description: 06/18/2024: v3 PR893288-5134 AGB 7/10/24 for D3 Call outs are failing 08/02/2024: Revert to Salesforce prof svcs version, update entry criteria 08/05/2024: Add CallDate Condition for invoice creation. EMI 08/06/2024: Update check current statement decision to check for both null and empty 08/07/2024: Update filter on Get Service Line Items action 08/09/2024: Update Work Order type decision to check for null call date on service tickets 08/13/2024: Add Is Service Ticket? decision 09/30/2024: Check whether SLIs returned 2/28/2024: AGB SSFI-975 SLI Units are rounding up
